name: Tonzura-kun
overview: Tonzura Kun is a strange action puzzle game in which the player controls Tozura a strange creature that is crazy for a girl, and in each stage he got to get to where the girl is, since like an easy task isn't it? But things are not easy for him since the girl is usually at the top of a pillar and he got to find the way to get to her, to do that he got to move several crates and put them together to build a ladder and climb up to where the girl is. The game features several stages in which the difficulty level is increasing since there are more crates to move and reach to where the girl is, so is better to think what is the best way to reach to where the girl is before starting moving the crates (or the player will have to restart the level is he mistake the proper way).
